verbose_text: A series of studies carried out in our laboratory have suggested that natakalim has a high selectivity for the SUR2B/Kir6.1 subtype of K ATP channels in endotheliocytes and promotes the secretion of NO and PGI 2 and inhibits the production of ET-1 in endotheliocytes.
evidence: natakalim has a high selectivity for the SUR2B/Kir6.1 subtype of K ATP  channels in endotheliocytes and promotes the secretion of NO and PGI
